Title: Tarzan
Writer: Reinhard Klooss (screenplay), Jessica Postigo (screenplay), Edgar Rice Burroughs (novel)
Actors: Kellan Lutz, Spencer Locke, Les Bubb, Joe Cappelletti
Plot: Tarzan and Jane Porter face a mercenary army dispatched by the evil CEO of Greystoke Energies, a man who took over the company from Tarzan's parents, after they died in a plane crash.
